english.segment1: Ive been to the Garden. Breathed the sweetest air. Alive and wanting more. Ate the fruit and honey. Ive tasted the sweetest sweet. I am full on life
english.segment2: So come on, come on now. Lets run together. Come on, come on now. Lets get together
english.segment3: To life, to love. To life, to love
english.segment4: I am addicted. I need more life from You. Dont let me suffocate. I need You closer. I wanna feel new wine now. Flowing through my veins
